title: New research finally solves the riddle of the turkey?
subtitle: Research is real, but it is not new and does not have a fundamental impact on the debate about the cause of the disease.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: New research has found that the real cause of fibrocysis is an excess of specific nerves found near a certain type of blood vessel in both hands and feet, ending the debate over the cause and the mechanism of the disease.
